Name: Angelic Protector
Story Background: Born from the purest of intentions, these celestial beings are charged with safeguarding the innocent and maintaining balance in the multiverse.
Ability: When Angelic Protector enters the battlefield, you may tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Appearance Description: Angelic Protector is a radiant figure with shimmering wings and a stoic expression, wielding a sword that glows with a divine light.
